items.title: Weekend Fun
items.description:
RkyMtnGrl posted a photo:

© Darlene Bushue 2021

This past weekend was so beautiful with temps in the high 40s, low 50s and lots of sunshine. It was nice to get out and about to enjoy some fresh mountain air, and as always, some fabulous scenery. Of course, it wouldn't be springtime in the mountains without a few snowy days and looks like we are expecting over 2 feet of snow later this week.

Have a fantastic week!!!!
items.author: nobody@flickr.com ("RkyMtnGrl")
items.tags: coloradolandscapes coloradomountains rockymountains rockymountainnationalpark rmnp stormpasstrail

items.title: Everyday Extraordinary
items.description:
RkyMtnGrl posted a photo:

© Darlene Bushue 2021

Sometimes as I'm driving along, scenes are just too good to pass up like this one as the filtered light was trying to break through the clouds and the snowflakes were flying. Photographed Sunday morning as I was coming home from the grocery store, along CO7 south of Estes Park.

Have a great Wednesday!!!

items.title: Blustery
items.description:
RkyMtnGrl posted a photo:

© Darlene Bushue 2020

Whatever is beautiful, whatever is meaningful, whatever brings happiness, may it be yours this holiday season and throughout the coming year.

A wintry, blustery scene from the high country; photographed in RMNP 12/22/2020.

Have a great week!!!
